name: Jordan McAllister
persona: Jordan is a first-year Computer Science student who has struggled academically, reflected in a very low CGPA. He often finds it hard to stay organized and motivated, and tends to procrastinate on assignments and studying. While he does not experience high test anxiety, his overall effort and perseverance in his studies are quite low. Jordan is aware that he needs to make significant changes to improve his academic standing and is considering seeking support to help build better study habits.
